title: Northwell Health CEO on NYC’s Covid-19 Response
itunes:title: Northwell Health CEO on NYC’s Covid-19 Response
description:
Michael Dowling, CEO at Northwell Health, discusses how New York’s largest health system has navigated the coronavirus pandemic. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Investing Reporter Annie Massa share their insight on why Robinhood is losing thousands of traders to a China-owned rival. Bloomberg News Senior Medical Reporter Michelle Cortez talks about the

FDA saying that Pfizer’s shot is effective and safe. And we Drive to the Close with Dan Pipitone, Co-Founder of TradeZero America.

Host: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
